titles.title: A bill to suspend until January 1, 1996, the duty on ioxilan, and to extend until January 1, 1996, the existing suspensions of duty on iohexol, iopamidol, and ioxaglic acid.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6955-6956)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/8/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1995, the suspension of duty on: (1) ioxilan; (2) iohexol; (3) iopamidol; and (4) ioxaglic acid.
